message:
Mora muslim jati,
Harite kovu sikhini.
Durgom giri joyi
Mora bir kandari.

Moder biplob suru hoy,
Borbor ei pritibite
Shovvo koriya tulilam tahader,
Aniya Islamer chayatole.

Sotrura moder pareni thekaite,
Koriya soto chalbaji;
Allah acen rokkok moder,
Ki koribe tader chaglami?

Dhaboman islam moder rokte;
Amader thakay ke?Biddut-chomok dey neurone moder,
Ei Islami chetonabodhe.

Thamaite pareni keu
Moder ei biplob.
Howk na se jotoi sobol.
Bijoy ace moder tore,
Ek Allahr rohmote.

Dekhite pas na tui
Er jolonto proman?
Komaite pareni abu jehl
Moder nabir somman.

Ek je chilo kutti,
abu lahaber stri.
Bichaito kata se nabir pothe,
Tobu thamaite pare ni
Se islamer prosar.

Chokranto korilo Ihudi salara,
Hotta koribe bisso nabike,
Bujlo na gadhara, songe ace tar bir sahabi ra.
Marite parite paribe na take rastar siyale.

Harailam mora durjoy romander,
Ajaner dhoni poichailam Spain'e
Tauhid loiya gelam Iran'e
Bajilo sethay Islamer donka.
Kintu jokhon vuliya allahr dasotto,
Gelam mora soytaner pothe,
Songi hoilo porajoyer glani,
Niche namiya hoilo kukurer jindegi.

Gelo sob somman moder,
Hoilam mora gulam kafirder.
Sob kichu gelo, koriya ekti vul;
-Chariya Allahr dasotto.

Jagiya uthilam ei pritibite abar,
Hate loiya al quran.
Biplob moder srestho akangkha,
Prothista koribo Allahr raj.

Hoilo mishor modher ghati,
Hoilen Qutb moder senani,
Voy pailo ekti kutta
Gamal naser tar nam.

Fasite julailo se kutubke
Thekaite Islamer raj.
Aj mishor chalay Qutuber dol;
Ikhwanul muslimun tar nam.

Karar sikol pareni thekaite,
Maududir ognisikamoy awaj.
Lakho biplobir praner spondon;
Tar lekha kitab.

Bachaite Saidir modhur kontho
Jibon dilo bir soto soto.
Tara sei durjoy kandari;
Jamaat-shibir tader nam.

Dibo najrana lakho sahidaner
Proman koribo driro chitto moder.
Paribe na haraite sainnara soytaner.
Nischito rohiyache bijoy moder
Rohmote ek Allahr.
-SAIFUR RAHAMAN,
FROM:TRIPURA,INDIA
